title: Dual Intel Xeon, 48Gb BEAST for under $700! (With Benchmarks)
description: It took me ages but I finally finished this dual Intel Xeon, 48 Gb beast for under $700.  Looking for some Noob-friendly, Dawid-Approved T-shirts? Shop here:   Watch to find out how this Frankenstein beast performs.  If you want to buy the Cooler Master Hyper 212 use this link:   If you are going to buy a new GPU in the same price range as the GTX 1060, try this instead:    Samsung 860 Evo:   *These links are affiliated*  -Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate- Instagram:  Twitter:  YouTube:
